content: Hi @WG-async-foundations, I'm going to be out of town and likely unable to attend next week's triage meeting. Would someone else like to volunteer to run that instance? If not we can just cancel that week.
If we cancel next week's we would have cancelled two in a row -- unless more people indicate they can't make it.
I'm happy to run next week's meeting tho (:
Sounds good. Why don't you run it on Monday then, @Yoshua Wuyts [he/they] !
